LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ProjectorEffectsDes: Determines when the shield projector field range overlays are visible. Note that shield systems are always active regardless even if they are not visible.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShowProjectorEffect: Always show field overlay for active shield projectors.
Shows shield projector field overlays for selected projectors.
Shows shield projector field overlays when any buildings in the same network are selected.
Shows shield projector field overlays when story danger is present on the current map.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShowInterceptionEff: Shows visual effects when shields intercept projectiles.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShowInterceptionGri: Shows the cached interception grid. Note that this does not represent the areas of the map completely protected by interceptors, it is the area wherein projectiles are checked.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ShowDefenseGridStat: Shows the defense grid status window.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ResetStatusWindowPo: Resets the position of the defense grid HUD to the center of the screen. Use in case it has become unreachable.
